title: World Coal Association urges UN to show greater ambition in Sustainable Development Goals (World Coal ...
text: ( Source : World Coal Association ) 25 September 2015 LONDON - The World Coal Association ( WCA ) has today welcomed the adoption of the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) but urged greater ambition in UN energy access targets and
